OrgName: Merrill Corporation and all its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities: Merrill Corporation may receive data including name, title, email, and telephone number from users of our services or those contacting us on our public facing website. We may use this information for contacting people relative to customer support and service issues; updates and troubleshooting; or when candidates may submit CV's for employment or contracting opportunities. Merrill DataSite provides a hosting platform where customers may upload data from global locations to our platform in the United States. Any such data is not assessed to content by Merrill Corporation, and our customer decides what, when and who has access to that data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Manually processed and electronically processed data for HR, independent contractors, customer and accounting
recoursemech: Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services (JAMS) and European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs)
